contentencoded: We reheat an old episode for this pre-Thanksgiving week, featuring, fittingly, an English take on American culture … Superstar comedian Kevin Hart growing an inch … Comic, writer, TV host and now etiquette expert Aisha Tyler steering listeners clear of video game hogs and sunshine nazis …  Memoirist Ashley Cardiff on being haunted by Prince … The Spinto Band with a menu of dinner party tunes … and Rico cooling off with Japanese beer.  Plus: The most famous soup cans in history, ‘shroom humor, and how the internet may be making us less intelligent.

title: Episode 228: Kevin Hart, Aisha Tyler, and Frozen Beer
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

We reheat an old episode for this pre-Thanksgiving week, featuring, fittingly, an English take on American culture … Superstar comedian Kevin Hart growing an inch … Comic, writer, TV host and now etiquette expert Aisha Tyler steering listeners clear of video game hogs and sunshine nazis …  Memoirist Ashley Cardiff on being haunted by Prince … The Spinto Band with a menu of dinner party tunes … and Rico cooling off with Japanese beer.  Plus: The most famous soup cans in history, ‘shroom humor, and how the internet may be making us less intelligent.
